actions.description: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

actions.description: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5–6)

traits.description: The giant can breathe air and water.
traits.name: Amphibious

traits.description:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light

3/day each: control weather, water breathing
traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
